message: The reason being said, People do have multiple accounts from the same network, especially Twitter... I might have a personal account, but I want to link my Company account to this particular website etc...

Another thing I just realized is, when you are showing Associations of the current user to Their social accounts, its actually good idea to show the User which account they associated.. In DB i realize its on UID of the Social Network User is saved.. Fine Facebook thats not a big deal.. But in Twitter thats a hassle.. You need to make Ajax calls using Twitter api to get the UserName associated with that UID... I am not sure if in BLOB field in DB if I allow SAVE extra data, will save this info, will try, but seems like every social network does have usernames allowed and Username centric. What do u guys think?
Here is a solution for Twitter, to show user info etc.. https://gist.github.com/1054582
